the clinic in New Jersey, has been fired for her handling of the alleged sex trafficking ring. The state attorney general has also launched an investigation into the manager's actions. Simon Cowell writes I look upon it[ groveling] as a sign of desperation. So many times people come in and they come up with this terrible dialogue about how much they like me or Randy or Paula. It's demeaning, and there's no point to it. We're not looking for a nice person; we're looking for somebody who's confident and assured, but talented above all. Trust me-- most stars aren't nice. 2.
